net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Util_ordinalPostfix
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Add the 'st', 'nd', 'rd', 'th' postfix to a number

arg(0)=Add the postfix to this number
arg(1)=Optional value to be returned if the number is zero. If not specified '0' is used
arg(2)=Optional string format to apply. If specified it must contain the string '%{value}' to work.

Returns the ordinal with the postfix formatted as requested
